shorts.title: Biden Picks Delaware for His Presidential Library

shorts.title: Pennsylvania Democrat Paige Cognetti joins 2026 race for Congress
shorts.title_distilled: Pennsylvania Democrat Paige Cognetti joins 2026 race for Congress.
shorts.description: Democrats need three seats to flip control of the House and party leaders say the road to the majority likely goes through Pennsylvania. Paige Cognetti is the latest candidate to announce a bid.

shorts.title: HS FOOTBALL NOTEBOOK: Dunmore defense has dominated in the early season
shorts.title_distilled: HS FOOTBALL NOTEBOOK: Dunmore defense has dominated in the early season.
shorts.description: Football has an adage attributed to legendary Alabama coach Paul “Bear” Bryant that states, “Offense sells tickets, defense wins championships.” So far this season, Dunmore has taken that to heart. Dunmore had high expectations heading into the season because of a wealth of experience returning on the defensive side of the ball after reaching the District 2 Class 2A final in 2024. That group has allowed the Bucks to get off to a 2-1 start with three straight impressive performances. In Week 3, Dunmore posted a shutout in a 50-0 win over Susquehanna. The Bucks limited Susquehanna to 86 total […]
